basics.name: George Oluoch
basics.label:
Passionate about IT Innovations.
Functional Lead, Business Consultant, On-site Lead, Pre-Sales consultant, Back Office & Mobility Innovation. Resourceful and proactive, I also have a solid ethic background with a professional commitment and responsibility as well as an excellent attitude in dealing with customers and colleagues. I posses excellent adaptation skills, time management and ability to work as an individual or in a team setting. I believe in delivering best results and am an innovator.I have years of experience in System Life-cycle Management (SLM) architecture, customization,implementation and support.I have a solid back ground in ERP & Sales and Distribution system implementation.I posses IT creative solutions for solving business problems.

Executive Summary

- Technical Management
- Project Management
- Sales & Distribution system analysis & implementation
- Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP).
- Strategic business planning.
- Security and disaster planning.
- IT Infrastructure design and implementation.
- Business Process & SLA Management & ITIL V3.
- Project Delivery – Plans that drive change and increase efficiency

Key Strengths:

Ability to communicate with business users across all levels. Ability to rapidly understand the core business drivers and translate these into deliverables for the development, implementation & maintenance of the infrastructure, applications, processes & controls required to deliver business services. Ability to align these services with the stated business strategy.

Opportunities looking for:

Looking forward to take up a challenging role in Business Analysis & Project Management Office with focus on finishing my expertise on business requirements gathering and project handling which would assist the organization to get optimum solutions as well as to increase its productivity in the market.

- A challenging IT post where I can impart my inventive persona and experience.
- Senior IT post .

work.company: Servetech-Unilever- Africa Leveredge Deployment, Central Africa, East Africa & West Africa
work.summary: System Test & Implementation Manager- Sales & Distribution System-ERP
work.desc:
•	Writing testing reports to project team
•	Managing team of testers
•	Technical support to clients
•	Back Office  & Mobility Integration Testing
•	MSSQL Administration
•	Server set up and administration
•	Reporting on the project progress
•	Technical analysis, troubleshooting, and problem resolution 
•	System  Testing
•	Reports analysis
•	Document Issues and monitor resolution's timelines
•	Conducting training to country  team
•	Back office & mobility analysis
•	Back office & mobility support
•	Writing Test Scripts
•	Preparing Test Environments
•	Test/QA Analyst
•	Preparing Production Environment
•	Review of requirement documents, functional and technical specifications to ensure that quality is embedded in the process
•	Customer satisfaction and Process  Oriented 
•	Track issues, defects, change requests etc.
•	Planning, monitoring and control of the testing activities as per project
•	Train new employees on the testing process

•	Projects Management
•	System implementer(Ultra integrating with SAP)
•	Software Testing
•	MSSQL development
•	SAP ULTRA INTERFACE implementation
•	SLA Management
•	Managing the team of testers
•	Helpdesk administrator
•	Customizing helpdesk
•	Helpdesk Consultant
•	Managing a team of implementers
•	System  administration

Implementing ERP Modules
Hansaworld ERP Project implementation
•	  ERP Testing 
•	  Database design
•	  Network administration  and Trouble Shooting
•	  Monitoring Network 
•	  Windows Server 2008 Administration
•	  Windows Server 2003 Administration
•	  MCITP Work Experience- Windows Server 2008
•	  MDaemon  administration-Windows Server 2003 Administration
•	   Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager Engineer
•	  Administration and deployment of centrally managed Server Symantec Antivirus
•	   Data analysis
